alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wood and Marathon Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of Council Grounds State Park to near Abbotsford to near Loyal to Humbird. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Abbotsford around 225 PM CDT. Spencer around 235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Marshfield, Wausau, Rib Mountain and Weston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
